title: linux操作
content: linux下安装阿帕奇 yum install httpd httpd-devel -y #安装 systemctl start httpd.service #启动 systemctl enable httpd.service #执行 firewall-cmd –zone=public –add-port=80/tcp –permanent #打开80防火墙 firewall-cmd –reload 确认

title: 计算机设计大赛国赛答辩复盘
content: 答辩反思 不要一个人孤军奋战 答辩经验太少 准备不充分
